content.value: I chose to build my 2025 portfolio in React, and reflecting on my 10 years of development experience, I decided to tackle three recurring challenges:
— Developers often re-implemented common components like buttons, modals, and accordions, leading to design drift.
— Duplicate code, common in many projects, slows down development and increases maintenance overhead.
— Accessibility is now a business requirement. Embedding WCAG standards directly into library components proactively reduces compliance risks.
